Healthy volunteer randomly ( chance ) assign receive single oral dose canagliflozin follow single oral dose placebo ( inactive substance ) single dose placebo follow single dose canagliflozin period 7-10 day treatment . Healthy volunteer also receive intravenous ( i.v . ) infusion ( injection vein ) somatostatin 4 hour single dose i.v . injection synthetic human C-peptide follow administration canagliflozin placebo treatment period . Somatostatin suppress normal secretion C-peptide , protein release pancreas insulin secretion , human C-peptide administer volunteer accurately measure . The total study duration volunteer approximately 44 day . During study , blood urine sample draw ( collect ) clinical laboratory evaluation .
